snippet.title: Regalia: Of Men and Monarchs - LAUNCH TRAILER
snippet.description:
A loving homage to classic JRPGs for Windows, OS X, and Linux  AVAILABLE NOW!

⚙️STEAM: 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/464150/Regalia_Of_Men_and_Monarchs/

⚙️GOG.COM: 
https://www.gog.com/game/regalia_of_men_and_monarchs
===
In Regalia: Of Men and Monarchs you will explore fairy tale universe, experience a story full of twists and learn how to rule the kingdom. You will take part in turn-based combat, fight against a wide range of monsters and bandits, while using strategic thinking to ensure the prosperity of your kingdom. You will travel through 6 differing regions full of missions guaranteeing over 30 hours of playtime. Meet new companions, make friends, and forge enduring relationships – it all will certainly pay off.
===

PLAY REGALIA TO EXPERIENCE: 

👑 Robust turn-based battles full of challenges
👑 6 regions to explore, each filled with battles, adventures, bosses and more!
👑 More than 20 unique characters to meet, recruit and befriend. Foster relationships and create the ultimate team of misfits!
👑 All you need to be a successful king: town management, diplomacy, expeditions
👑 A light-hearted story with tons of humour and a fair amount of epicness
👑 Over 30 hours of gameplay
👑 Huge replayability factor: you won’t discover all the content in just one playthrough
👑 Craft new, powerful weapons
👑 Beautiful graphics with hand-drawn 2D backgrounds 
👑 Orchestral soundtrack composed by Game Audio Factory, known for Furi, Endless Legend or Endless Space
👑 Professional English voice acting
👑 Samurai dwarves!

===
*VISIT OUR WEBSITE: https://regaliagame.com/
*LIKE THE GAME ON FACEBOOK: https://www.fb.com/regaliagame

...OR FOLLOW KLABATER'S CRAZY EXPLOITS AND WILD SHENANIGANS:
https://www.fb.com/klabater/
https://twitter.com/klabater
===
